start.speaker: Korinth
start.text:
Four breaths.

On the fourth, you strike. Not sooner. Not later. Your fear will beg you to hurry—do not bargain with it.

choices.text: Teach me. I’ll hold the rhythm.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: Your lungs burn. Your hands stop shaking. The cold feels less like a tyrant and more like a measurement.
